    Buitrago-Casas et al., (2021). FOXSI-4: “The High Resolution Focusing X-ray Rocket Payload to Observe a Solar Flare”. Proceedings Volume 11821, UV, X-Ray, and Gamma-Ray Space Instrumentation for Astronomy XXII https://doi.org/10.1117/12.2594701
